value.title: AI (Artificial Intelligence) Lessons From The World Series
value.excerpt: So in light of all this, what are the lessons here? To answer this question, I asked some top people in the AI field and here’s what they had to say: Hindsight is always 20/20, but Cash’s decision to pull Snell illustrates the myopia that can occur when analytics are elevated above commonsense.
